author: Natt Garun
title: ClassPass brings back live-streamed workout classes to help you get fit at home
description: After shuttering its ClassPass Live product last year, the company is bringing back live-streamed workouts as more people are quarantining inside their homes during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
ClassPass Live was previously shuttered last year
Image: ClassPass
ClassPass is bringing back its previously discontinued ClassPass Live offering to allow fitness studios to stream workouts and other wellness sessions to members through Facebook Live, Twitc… [+1340 chars]
